name: Spongebob's Day of Terror [Fan Horror]
description:
Ahh, here we are in Bikini Bottom Rock Bottom.

You're Spongebob. You've been trapped in the eerie place known as Rock Bottom, and the only way out is to take the next bus. You must find objects around the world, sell them for cash, and buy that bus ticket to get out of here all while avoiding an evil angler fish whose sole purpose is to kill you.

$99.46 donated so far <3

Like my games? Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/HawkSandwich

Wanna join my Discord? C'mon over and we'll talk about whatever you'd like https://discord.gg/Gfcvaqw

In case someone can't tell, this is NOT an official Spongebob game. I have no affiliation with the owners of Spongebob; this is just a fan-made game.

If you play this game on your YouTube channel, please leave a link in the comments so I can see!

This is my first Unreal Engine game, and was made mostly as a learning experience.
